arts.ttl: Who needs Eze? Spurs' win at Man City shows transfers aren't everything
arts.sum: Losing out to Arsenal for Eberechi Eze was humbling for Spurs. But maybe they've already made their signing of the summer by hiring Thomas Frank.

arts.ttl: Spurs stun Man City as perfect start under Frank continues
arts.sum: Tottenham extended their perfect start to life under new boss Thomas Frank by stunning Manchester City 2-0 at the Etihad to claim their second win of the Premier League season.
